item.title: Pairing Vs Code Review
item.description: Note This was written mostly immediately after I joined CoreOS and then updated this last week. I recently started working at CoreOS and one thing that they do there for every change of code is a code review. I have never had code reviews before. I’ve mostly worked in environments where I have paired directly with people. So I wanted to do a quick review on the differences between the two methods.
